document_data.name: Jhaamdathan Pantheon
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Jhaamdathan pantheon''' was one of the human proto-pantheons that eventually merged with others to form the [[Faer√ªnian pantheon]]. Its members were worshiped in [[Jhaamdath]], around what was later called the [[Vilhon Reach]] and [[Dragon Coast]].
<!--==Organization==
document_data.Members:
*[[Auppenser]], god of moderation, inner balance, self-reflection, and reason.
*[[Murdane]], goddess of pragmatism and reason. Lover to [[Helm]].
*[[Valigan Thirdborn]], deity of anarchy.<ref>
*[[Tyr|Arrtyr]] Judge of All, god of justice.<ref>{{Cite web/Candlekeep forum/Questions for Ed Greenwood (2014)/Tyr's ancient past}}
